sqlMap.select: select count(1) from t_dailywork t where t.State>=0 t.id='$pid$' t.title='$ptitle$' t.dailyworktype='$pdailyworktype$' t.missiongrade='$pmissiongrade$' t.attachment='$pattachment$' t.target='$ptarget$' t.targetvalue='$ptargetvalue$' t.feedbackpattern='$pfeedbackpattern$' t.makedatetime >= cast(#pbegmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.makedatetime <= cast(#pendmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.maker='$pmaker$' t.remark='$premark$' t.executors='$pexecutors$' t.state='$pstate$' order by T.ID desc

select t.id ,t.title ,t.dailyworktype,FB_GetParm_ById(t.dailyworktype,'dictionary') dailyworktypename ,t.missiongrade,FB_GetParm_ById(t.missiongrade,'dictionary') missiongradename ,t.attachment ,t.target ,t.targetvalue ,t.feedbackpattern,FB_GetParm_ById(t.feedbackpattern,'pattern') feedbackpatternname ,cast(t.makedatetime AS CHAR) makedatetime ,t.maker,FB_GetParm_ById(t.maker,'user') makername ,t.remark ,t.executors,'' executorsname ,t.state from t_dailywork t where T.State>=0 t.id='$pid$' t.title='$ptitle$' t.dailyworktype='$pdailyworktype$' t.missiongrade='$pmissiongrade$' t.attachment='$pattachment$' t.target='$ptarget$' t.targetvalue='$ptargetvalue$' t.feedbackpattern='$pfeedbackpattern$' t.makedatetime >= cast(#pbegmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.makedatetime <= cast(#pendmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.maker='$pmaker$' t.remark='$premark$' t.executors='$pexecutors$' t.state='$pstate$' order by T.ID desc

select t.id ,t.title ,t.dailyworktype,FB_GetParm_ById(t.dailyworktype,'dictionary') dailyworktypename ,t.missiongrade,FB_GetParm_ById(t.missiongrade,'dictionary') missiongradename ,t.attachment ,t.target ,t.targetvalue ,t.feedbackpattern,FB_GetParm_ById(t.feedbackpattern,'pattern') feedbackpatternname ,cast(t.makedatetime AS CHAR) makedatetime ,t.maker,FB_GetParm_ById(t.maker,'user') makername ,t.remark ,t.executors ,t.state from t_dailywork t where T.State>=0 t.id='$pid$' t.title='$ptitle$' t.dailyworktype='$pdailyworktype$' t.missiongrade='$pmissiongrade$' t.attachment='$pattachment$' t.target='$ptarget$' t.targetvalue='$ptargetvalue$' t.feedbackpattern='$pfeedbackpattern$' t.makedatetime >= cast(#pbegmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.makedatetime <= cast(#pendmakedatetime# AS DATE) t.maker='$pmaker$' t.remark='$premark$' t.executors='$pexecutors$' t.state='$pstate$' order by T.ID desc
limit $START$ , $END$
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_dailywork (id title dailyworktype missiongrade attachment target targetvalue feedbackpattern maker remark executors ,State,makedatetime) values ( '$pid$' seqformat(@in_seq_name:='t_dailywork') #ptitle# #pdailyworktype# #pmissiongrade# #pattachment# #ptarget# #ptargetvalue# #pfeedbackpattern# #pmaker# #premark# #pexecutors# ,0,now())
select FB_GetSeqn('t_dailywork') as id
insert into t_dailyworkexcute (id pid executorid ) values (seqformat(@in_seq_name:='t_dailyworkexcute') #pid# #pexecutorid#)
sqlMap.delete: update t_dailywork set State=-1 where id=#pid#
update t_dailywork set state='$pstate$' where id in ($pid$) state='$pexstate$'
sqlMap.update: update t_dailywork t set t.id=t.id title=#ptitle# dailyworktype=#pdailyworktype# missiongrade=#pmissiongrade# attachment=#pattachment# target=#ptarget# targetvalue=#ptargetvalue# feedbackpattern=#pfeedbackpattern# makedatetime=cast(#pmakedatetime# AS DATETIME) maker=#pmaker# remark=#premark# executors=#pexecutors# state=#pstate# where id=#pid# and t.State >=0
sqlMap.select: select id,PatternName name from T_Pattern where State=1 and PatternType=1 order by id desc
select t.tablename,n.fieldname,n.fielddesc,n.fieldtype from t_pattern t left join t_patternd n on t.id=n.pid where T.State>=0 and t.patterntype='1' and n.state>=0 t.id='$pid$' order by n.fieldseqn

select count(*) from $tablename$ where state>=0
parentId='$pparentId$'
limit $START$ , $END$

select * from $tablename$ where state>=0
parentId='$pparentId$'
limit $START$ , $END$
sqlMap.update: update $tablename$ t set t.id=t.id stateRemark='$preplyremark$' where t.id=#pid# and t.state >=0
